text: Giovanni Battista Bussi de Pretis Giovanni Battista Bussi de Pretis (Urbino, 11 September 1721 – Jesi, 27 June 1800) was an Italian cleric promoted by Pope Pius VI to the rank of cardinal in the consistory of 21 February 1794. He replaced Buenaventura Fernández de Córdoba Spínola as Cardinal-Priest of San Lorenzo in Panisperna. ==References== Category:1721 births Category:1800 deaths Category:Italian cardinals Category:Cardinals created by Pope Pius VI
title: Giovanni Battista Bussi de Pretis
